Touches 4+ files in backend/src/payment directory and associated test files, exceeding 400 LOC and involving multiple domains.

use async_trait::async_trait;
use crate::payment::{PaymentAdapter, PaymentError, PaymentResult};

pub struct StripeAdapter;

#[async_trait]
impl PaymentAdapter for StripeAdapter {
    async fn process_payment(&self, amount: i64, currency: &str) -> PaymentResult<String> {
        // Simulate payment processing
        if amount <= 0 {
            return Err(PaymentError::InvalidAmount(amount));
        }
        Ok(format!("stripe_charge_{}", uuid::Uuid::new_v4()))
    }

## Last Failure (Wed Jan 14 18:26:27 CET 2026)
```
echo 'use async_trait::async_trait;
use crate::payment::{PaymentAdapter, PaymentError, PaymentResult};

pub struct StripeAdapter;

const SUPPORTED_CURRENCIES: &[&str] = &["USD", "EUR", "GBP"];

#[async_trait]
impl PaymentAdapter for StripeAdapter {
    async fn process_payment(&self, amount: i64, currency: &str) -> PaymentResult<String> {
        if amount <= 0 {
            return Err(PaymentError::InvalidAmount(amount));
        }
        if !SUPPORTED_CURRENCIES.contains(&currency) {
            return Err(PaymentError::InvalidCurrency(currency.to_string()));
        }
        Ok(format!("stripe_charge_{}", uuid::Uuid::new_v4()))
    }

    async fn refund_p
```
